/*! ========================================================= * Paper Dashboard React - v1.3.0 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/paper-dashboard-react * Copyright 2021 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/paper-dashboard-react/blob/main/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; // react plugin used to create charts import { Line, Pie } from "react-chartjs-2"; // reactstrap components import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, CardTitle, Row, Col, Table } from "reactstrap"; // core components import {StockPriceChart} from "variables/charts.js" import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import { SwitchTab } from "components/Switch/ToggleSwitch"; const default_stock_tickers = "AAPL, TSLA"; function Stock_info_form({fetch_data}) { const [tickers, setTickers] = useState(default_stock_tickers); const [start_date, setStartDate] = useState('2020-01-10'); const [end_date, setEndDate] = useState('2020-01-20'); useEffect(() => { fetch_data(tickers, start_date, end_date) }, []) const handleSubmit = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault(); fetch_data(tickers, start_date, end_date) }; return ( <>
Tickers setTickers(e.target.value)}/> Start Date setStartDate(e.target.value)}/> End Date setEndDate(e.target.value)}/>
) }; const table =
Symbol Name Price Change
1 TSLA MSFT AAPL
2 Tesla Inc. Microsoft Apple
32 43 34 15
6 5 4 3
; function Dashboard() { const [stock_data, setStock_data] = useState({}); const [file, upLoadFile] = useState(); async function fetch_data (tickers, start_date, end_date) { let request_url = `http://localhost:8000/data/load_hist_stock_price/${start_date}/${end_date}?`; const ticker_list = tickers.split(',').map(function(item){ return item.trim(); }) for (let i = 0; i < ticker_list.length; i++){ if (i == 0){ request_url += `q=${ticker_list[i]}`; console.log(`q=${ticker_list[i]}`) } else{ request_url += `&q=${ticker_list[i]}`; console.log(`q=${ticker_list[i]}`) } }; const response = await fetch(request_url); const data = await response.json(); const dataset = []; for (let i = 0; i < ticker_list.length; i ++){ let data_dict = { label:ticker_list[i], pointRadius: 0, pointHoverRadius: 0, borderWidth: 3, tension: 0.4, fill: false, data: data[ticker_list[i]]}; dataset.push(data_dict) }; const line_chart_data = {labels: data['date'], datasets: dataset}; setStock_data(line_chart_data) } function handleFileUpload(event) { upLoadFile(event.target.files[0]) } return ( <>
{/*

Capacity

150GB

Update Now

Revenue

$ 1,345

Last day

Errors

In the last hour

Followers

+45K

Update now
*/} Top Gainers {table} Top Losers {table} Analysis
); } export default Dashboard;
